name: Bernal Heights After School Program
description: The After School Program provides grades K-5 with homework assistance, that promotes literacy, encourages communication and empowerment skills. Also available: recreation activities including sports, group games, arts and culture, community exploration and seasonal special events. Start times may vary based on the school release time.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
cost: The fee for the school year is $950. Parents will have the option to pay the entire fee upon registration. Payment plans are available. $237.50 is due upon registration and on the first day of October, January and March of the school year.
